name: Project Spelldice
description:
Spelldice is a prototype for a roguelike deckbuilder using dice. Take turns rolling dice and combine them to cast powerful spells and defeat your opponents. The game is controlled entirely by the mouse, and you can hold right click to speed up the animations.

Credits:
Dice Icons by The Noun Project
Spell Icons by J. W. Bjerk
Character Models and Animations by Mixamo
Spell Particle Effects by Synty Studios
